name: QuiVr
description: QuiVr is the defining archery experience, made from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Grab your bow, arrows, and some friends to fight the enemy onslaught.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
